  • SceneObject

Interface SceneObject

Geometry and materials for an object in a SceneModel.

See Scene for usage examples.

Summary
  • Contained in a SceneModel
  • Created with SceneModel.createObject
  • Registered in SceneModel.objects and Scene.objects
  • Has a ViewObject in each View

Hierarchy

  • SceneObject

Index

Properties

Readonly aabb

aabb: FloatArrayParam
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneObject.ts:37

The axis-aligned World-space 3D boundary of this SceneObject.

Readonly id

id: string
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneObject.ts:27

Unique ID of this SceneObject.

Readonly model

model: SceneModel
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneObject.ts:22

The SceneModel that contains this SceneObject.

Readonly viewLayerId

viewLayerId: string
  • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/scene/SceneObject.ts:32

Which ViewLayer this SceneObject belongs to.
